Dialogues.narration: You heard disturbances coming from the dock, maybe you should go take a look.
Dialogues.text: Check out the source of disturbance.

replies.buttonText: There is a familiar voice you heard, go see what is going on from the deck.
You heard two people arguing, look out from the window.

Dialogues.text: You saw two poorly dressed men and woman arguing about something. They stopped to look at you when they feel your gaze, and point to their card board which reads: 'LOOKING FOR WORK, price of two able hands for one.'
Dialogues.narration: Check out the source of disturbance.

replies.text: Gesture them to come up to your ship.

Dialogues.text: You get out to the deck and see Watson, an old time friend. He left the navy about 2 years ago and have not heard from him since. He told you that he heard you are looking to recruit people for a mission so he come to see if he can help with that.
Dialogues.narration: Check out the source of disturbance.

replies.text: You give he a pat on the shoulder and welcomed him. He hands you a coin, a lucky coin he says.
You felt something is off but you couldn't tell what. You refused his offer.

Dialogues.text: You give he a pat on the shoulder and welcomed him. He hands you a coin, a lucky coin he says.
Dialogues.narration: You walked away from the dock

Dialogues.speaker: Watson
Dialogues.narration: He shrugs and then hand you a coin.
Dialogues.text: For old time sake. Goodbye then.
